column4: im trying to install offline mi wifi rt3090 with the deb pacage from http:// ppa.launchpad. net/markus- tisoft/ rt3090 but when i executed it tells me that i need a dependenci : dkms, what is this? should i donwload that packet to?
you should also look at Keryx.  http://keryxproject.org
the problem is that most software packages depend on others and those in turn depend on even more. It takes software like Keryx to find all those dependencies for you. Hope that makes sense.  :-)
if i use the synaptic package option to "export" a package from this computer will be like an "instaler" or thats why you link me to the keryx project so i can do that xd?
